Instance Method# isApproximatelyEqual(to:tolerance:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOSwatchOS 11.0+

```
func isApproximatelyEqual(
    to other: Rotation3D,
    tolerance: Double = sqrt(.ulpOfOne)
) -> Bool
```
